metadata.title: CVE-2023-37454 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.4.2. A crafted UDFfilesystem image causes a use-after-free write operation in theudf_put_super and udf_close_lvid functions in fs/udf/super.c. NOTE: thesuse.com reference has a different perspective about this.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needs-triage').
